name: The Power Marauder
description:
You haven't paid your bills. Well, not like you've paid them when you first moved in! Cheat your electric bill by snatching the volt crystal at the end, and return to that sweet $19 portal you got off of etsy... Hopefully the cheaply made portal won't warp you to some weird reality with a giant creature. 

Jake Shonts - Programming, Level Design, Shaders, Quality Control 

Gale Falikson - Art Assets, Music, Animations 

Alexander Go - Programming 

David Wong - Concepts

Playtesters - Anselm "Nick" Berman, Devin Cook
